mapper.select: SELECT pais.id_ubigeo AS codigo_pais, pais.descripcion AS pais, region.id_ubigeo AS codigo_region, region.descripcion AS region, provincia.id_ubigeo AS codigo_provincia, provincia.descripcion AS provincia, c.direccion, c.area_empresa AS codigo_area, p.valor AS area, c.contacto, c.email, c.telefono FROM proveedor_canal_contacto c INNER JOIN UBIGEO pais ON c.id_pais = pais.id_ubigeo INNER JOIN UBIGEO region ON c.id_region = region.id_ubigeo INNER JOIN UBIGEO provincia ON c.id_provincia = provincia.id_ubigeo LEFT JOIN PARAMETROS p ON p.modulo = 'CONTACTO' AND p.tipo = 'AREA' AND c.area_empresa = p.codigo WHERE c.id_proveedor = #{idProveedor}

SELECT pv.acreedor_codigo_sap AS codigo_sap, pv.ruc, pv.razon_social, pais.descripcion AS pais, region.descripcion AS region, provincia.descripcion AS provincia, pcc.direccion, COALESCE(p.valor, '-') AS punto_atencion, pcc.contacto, pcc.email, pcc.telefono FROM PROVEEDOR_CANAL_CONTACTO pcc INNER JOIN PROVEEDOR pv ON pcc.id_proveedor = pv.id_proveedor INNER JOIN UBIGEO pais ON pcc.id_pais = pais.id_ubigeo INNER JOIN UBIGEO region ON pcc.id_region = region.id_ubigeo LEFT JOIN UBIGEO provincia ON pcc.id_provincia = provincia.id_ubigeo LEFT JOIN PARAMETROS p ON p.modulo = 'CONTACTO' AND p.tipo = 'AREA' AND p.codigo = pcc.area_empresa ORDER BY pv.razon_social;
